# recordID

**Instance Property**

The ID of the referenced record.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var recordID: CKRecord.ID { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the ID in this property to fetch the record on the other end of the link.

## Getting the Reference Attributes

- **action**: The ownership behavior for the records.
- **CKRecord.ReferenceAction**: Constants that indicate the behavior when deleting a referenced record.
